news.title: Three former bosses of Lucy Letby arrested on suspicion of gross negligence manslaughter
news.summary: All three worked at the Countess of Chester Hospital between 2015 and 2016, when Letby killed babies at the neonatal unit.

news.title: Chief rabbi attacks BBC for airing 'vile Jew hate' at Glastonbury
news.summary: Sir Ephraim Mirvis hit out after Bob Vylan's controversial performance at Glastonbury was aired by BBC.

news.title: US-Israeli backed Gaza aid group must be shut down, say 130 charities
news.summary: The call from some of the world's top aid organisations and charities comes after reports of soldiers killing hundreds of of Palestinians at aid sites.

news.title: House prices see biggest monthly fall for over two years
news.summary: The Nationwide says the fall may reflect weaker demand following April's changes to stamp duty.

news.title: 92-year-old man sentenced to life in prison for 1967 murder and rape
news.summary: Ryland Headley, who was 34 when he raped and strangled Louisa Dunne, was told he will die in prison.
